constituent: buy, eye, cross-eyed, net, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: When something catches my eye, I take out a few clams and buy before anybody else does.
koohiiStory2: Rules to Buying: 1. You´ve had your eye on it for a while. 2. You have enough shells to afford it.
myStory: mua. mắt ngang và vỏ sò
